Uses of Image in jigl.image
 

Classes in jigl.image that implement Image
 class BinaryImage
          BinaryImage is a 2-d array of byte.
 class ColorImage
          A color image is a set of three gray image planes.
 class ComplexImage
          A complex image is a set of two real gray image planes.
 class GrayImage
          GrayImage is a 2-d array of shorts
 class ImageKernel
          ImageKernel is an extension of GrayImage with some pre-defined kernals.
 class RealColorImage
          A color image is a set of three gray image planes.
 class RealGrayImage
          RealGrayImage is a 2-d array of floats
